translation.en: [boy 1] We're the Pogues, and our mission this summer
translation.zh: 我们是小鱼儿 今年夏天的任务是过得快乐

translation.en: is to have a good time, all the time.
translation.zh: 我们是小鱼儿 今年夏天的任务是过得快乐 每时每刻都快乐

translation.en: [boy 2] That's what, a three-story fall to the deck?
translation.zh: 那相当于从三层高的地方 落到甲板上吗？

translation.en: I give you about a one-in-three chance of survival.
translation.zh: 你活下来的几率大概是三分之一

translation.en: -Should I do it? -[boy 2] Yeah, jump.
translation.zh: -我该跳吗？ -是的 你该跳

translation.en: -I'll shoot you on the way down. -You'll shoot me?
translation.zh: 你跳下来时 我就开枪 -你要开枪射我？ -对

translation.en: -[boy 2] Yep. -Pow! They're gonna have Japanese toilets with towel warmers.
translation.zh: 他们要弄日式厕所和浴巾加热器

translation.en: -[boy 3] Of course. Why wouldn't they? -This used to be a turtle habitat,
translation.zh: -他们当然会 为什么不呢？ -这里曾是海龟栖息地

translation.en: but who cares about the turtles, I guess?
translation.zh: 但我想谁在乎海龟呢 ？

translation.en: -[boy 3] I can't have cold towels. -Can you please not kill yourself?
translation.zh: 我没法用冷毛巾 你能别自杀吗？

translation.en: Don't spill that beer. I'm not giving you another one.
translation.zh: 啤酒别洒了 我不会再给你了

translation.en: [boy 1] Whoa! Oh, shit.
translation.zh: 哦 该死

translation.en: -[boy 3] Of course you did. -Smooth.
translation.zh: -你当然会洒 -漂亮

translation.en: [girl] Dumbass.
translation.zh: -干得好 -笨蛋

translation.en: -[man] Hey! -Hey, uh, security's here.
translation.zh: -嘿！ -嘿 保安来了

translation.en: -Let's wrap it up. -Boys are early today.
translation.zh: -该走了 -他们今天提前了

translation.en: Humpty Dumpty, let's roll. [exclaims]
translation.zh: 矮胖子 走吧

translation.en: -[boy 1] Yeah. -Let's go, boys.
translation.zh: -好 -走吧 帅哥们

translation.en: [boy 3] Gary, is that you? -[boy 2] Get down. -[boy 3] It's me.
translation.zh: -盖瑞 是你吗？ -嘿 你知道是我

translation.en: -Gary, good to see you, man! -[boy 1] Is it time?
translation.zh: -盖瑞 见到你真好 伙计！ -时间到了？

translation.en: -You're asking for it. -[Gary] JJ!
translation.zh: 对 你自找的

translation.en: -♪ Watch his right hand slip... ♪ -[Gary] Hey, stop!
translation.zh: 站住！

translation.en: Get 'em! They're comin' your way!
translation.zh: 抓住他们！他们朝你那边来了！

translation.en: Hey! Stop!
translation.zh: -嘿！ -站住！

translation.en: -[guard] I got him! -[JJ] Not much of a hugger!
translation.zh: -我逮到他了 -我不喜欢拥抱 伙计！

translation.en: [JJ] Go, Pope! Go! Go, go, go, go, go, go!
translation.zh: 快走 教皇！ 快走！

translation.en: -[JJ] Get up, Pope, fatso's coming. -[guard] Hey!
translation.zh: -起来 教皇 快 我们走 -嘿！

translation.en: Come here, you little pricks!
translation.zh: 过来 小混球！

translation.en: -[horn honks] -[boy 1] Bus is leaving!
translation.zh: 公车要走了！

translation.en: [girl] Come on, boys! Whoo!
translation.zh: 快点 帅哥们！

translation.en: [Gary] Hey, hey! Hey! Hey!
translation.zh: 嘿！

translation.en: -Check out Gary, gunnin' for a raise. -[JJ] Come on, Gary!
translation.zh: -瞧 盖瑞好卖命 -来呀 盖瑞！

translation.en: -Wait. Slow down. -Hey! You little pricks!
translation.zh: -等等 慢点 -嘿 小混蛋！

translation.en: -[Gary] Hey! -You're gonna give him a heart attack.
translation.zh: 停下 各位 你们要让他心脏病发作了

translation.en: You're so close! You can do it. There you go.
translation.zh: 你快追上了！给你

translation.en: -[groans] They don't pay you enough, bro. -JJ, stop. Stop.
translation.zh: -他们给你的薪水少了 兄弟 -JJ 停下

translation.en: Oh, come on. That sort of initiative is just begging to be punished.
translation.zh: 得了 这样的惩罚是他们自找的

translation.en: -♪ Oh, no ♪ -[teens chatting indistinctly]
translation.zh: （欢迎来到外滩 人间天堂）

translation.en: [boy 1] The Outer Banks, Paradise on Earth.
translation.zh: 外滩是人间天堂

translation.en: It's the sort of place where you either have two jobs or two houses.
translation.zh: 在这里 要么你打两份工 要么你有两套房

translation.en: Two tribes, one island.
translation.zh: 一座岛 两个部落

translation.en: [boy 1] All right. This is Figure Eight, the rich side of the island.
translation.zh: 好吧 这里是八字区 岛上富有的一边

translation.en: Home of the Kooks. So, guess where we don't live.
translation.zh: 鲨鱼们的家 所以我们不住在这里

translation.en: [girl] Whoo!
translation.zh: （禁止钓鱼 小鱼儿的地盘 ）

translation.en: [boy 1] And then, this is the south side or the cut.
translation.zh: 而这里是南边 也称“僻地”

translation.en: Home of the working class who make a living busing tables,
translation.zh: 工薪阶层住的地方 人们靠当服务生

translation.en: washing yachts, running charters.
translation.zh: 洗游艇和运营租船业务为生

translation.en: The natural habitat of... drumroll, please...
translation.zh: 这里就是…请来点鼓声

translation.en: ...the Pogues.
translation.zh: 小鱼儿的自然栖息地 就是我们

translation.en: That's us.
translation.zh: 小鱼儿的自然栖息地 就是我们 （HMS小鱼儿号）

translation.en: -Pogues, pogies, the throwaway fish. -[exhales]
translation.zh: 小鱼儿 小鲫鱼 被扔掉的鱼 处于食物链的底端

translation.en: [boy 1] Lowest member of the food chain. Okay. So, the downside of Pogue life
translation.zh: 小鱼儿 小鲫鱼 被扔掉的鱼 处于食物链的底端 好吧 身为小鱼儿的缺点是被人忽略

translation.en: is we're ignored and neglected.
translation.zh: 好吧 身为小鱼儿的缺点是被人忽略

translation.en: But the upside of Pogue life? We're ignored and neglected,
translation.zh: 但身为小鱼儿的优点：也是被人忽略

translation.en: which means we do whatever we want, whenever we want.
translation.zh: 这意味着我们随时都能随心所欲

translation.en: -[JJ] Nice haul, dude. Look at that. -[girl] Ugh, John B.
translation.zh: -好多鱼 老兄 瞧瞧 -小约翰

translation.en: [JJ] Been all bait for, like, three weeks.
translation.zh: 三周的鱼饵都有了

translation.en: -[laughs] Gross. -[fish thuds]
translation.zh: 恶心

translation.en: [John B] That's JJ, my best friend since the third grade.
translation.zh: 这是JJ 从三年级起 他就一直是我最好的朋友

translation.en: He's about as local as they come.
translation.zh: 他算是名副其实的当地人

translation.en: Latest in a long line of fishing, drinking,
translation.zh: 和许多人一样钓鱼、喝酒

translation.en: smuggling, vendetta-holding salt-lifers who made their living off the water.
translation.zh: 走私、充满家族仇恨 靠海吃海 以海为乐

translation.en: Best surfer I know. Just don't tell him I said that.
translation.zh: 是我认识的冲浪最厉害的人 这话别告诉他

translation.en: Mild kleptomaniac and a future tax cheat.
translation.zh: 有点小偷小摸 未来的偷税漏税者

translation.en: -[girl] Do we have a name? -[girl 2] Hey!
translation.zh: -你叫什么名字？ -嘿

translation.en: -Hey. -[girl] Is this guy in prison?
translation.zh: 这家伙还没坐牢吗？

translation.en: -How has that not happened? -Come on.
translation.zh: 怎么还没坐牢？放开我！

translation.en: Get off me. Don't even get me started on microplastic.
translation.zh: 怎么还没坐牢？放开我！ 别让我开始提微塑料的事

translation.en: Have you even heard about that island? That little island of just...
translation.zh: 你听说过那个岛吗？就是那个小岛…

translation.en: [John B] And that's Kiara, or Kie, as we call her.
translation.zh: 那是琪娅拉 我们叫她“小琪”

translation.en: -Oh, everything-- -[John B] When not saving turtles
translation.zh: 如果她没在拯救乌龟、听马利的歌

translation.en: or listening to Marley, or getting a dolphin tattoo, she hangs out with us.
translation.zh: 如果她没在拯救乌龟、听马利的歌 或弄海豚纹身 她就跟我们在一起

translation.en: -[Kie laughs] -I'm not really sure why, though.
translation.zh: 但我真不懂为什么

translation.en: So, she's a rich kid, actually.
translation.zh: 其实她是个富二代 两边她都有来往

translation.en: -Foot in both worlds. -Stop, guys! My dad is gonna kill me.
translation.zh: 其实她是个富二代 两边她都有来往 我爸会杀了我

translation.en: [John B] Her family owns The Wreck, this Outer Banks institution.
translation.zh: 沉船是他们家开的 这是位于外滩的一家餐厅

translation.en: Total cash cow with the tourists.
translation.zh: 做游客生意 堪称摇钱树

translation.en: You know, I'm not really sure how her parents feel about us.
translation.zh: 我不清楚她父母怎么看我们

translation.en: -[teens speaking indistinctly] -[John B] We all have a thing for her.
translation.zh: 我想我们都对她有意思

translation.en: Get out. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 出去

translation.en: [John B] And that's Pope, the brains of the operation...
translation.zh: 那是教皇 行动的主脑

translation.en: finalist for the Lucas T. Vanderhorst Merit Scholarship.
translation.zh: 卢卡斯T范德霍斯特优秀奖学金 的最后入围者

translation.en: -And the smartest person I know. -Stop touching that.
translation.zh: 我认识的最聪明的人 别再碰那个了

translation.en: -I want to be a coroner. -[girl] What?
translation.zh: -我想当验尸官 -什么？

translation.en: [John B] Little bit of a weirdo.
translation.zh: 有点古怪 健怡可乐？

translation.en: His father's this legendary character, Heyward.
translation.zh: 好了 他父亲是传奇人物海沃德

translation.en: Anything you wanted on the island, Heyward could get for you.
translation.zh: 在岛上 无论你想要什么 海沃德都能帮你弄到

translation.en: -Yeah. -Appreciate it.
translation.zh: 感谢

translation.en: [John B] Now, I'm not sure Heyward knew what to make of his oddball son,
translation.zh: 我不清楚海沃德 怎么看自己古怪的儿子

translation.en: but it didn't matter. He was a Pogue, just like the rest of us.
translation.zh: 但这不重要 他是小鱼儿 跟我们其他人一样

translation.en: ♪ Baby ♪
translation.zh: 宝贝

translation.en: [John B] So, that's my crew.
translation.zh: 好了 这就我的伙伴们

translation.en: And that's me, John Booker Routledge.
translation.zh: 这是我 约翰布克瑞特里奇

translation.en: -Dude! Come on, man. Get outta here. -[can clatters]
translation.zh: 兄弟！快点 出去

translation.en: [John B] And this is where I live.
translation.zh: 我住在这里

translation.en: -Morning, Kie. -Morning.
translation.zh: 早 小琪 早

translation.en: [John B] An old fish shack on the marsh. The Château, as my dad used to call it.
translation.zh: 沼泽里的一个旧渔屋 我爸以前叫它“城堡”

translation.en: There's Dad.
translation.zh: 那是我爸

translation.en: He disappeared at sea nine months ago, looking for a shipwreck.
translation.zh: 九个月前 他去寻找一艘沉船 在海上失踪了

translation.en: Who disappears at sea these days?
translation.zh: 这年头谁会在海上失踪啊？

translation.en: I miss him.
translation.zh: 我想念他

translation.en: And then there's Mom. She split when I was three.
translation.zh: 这是我妈 我三岁时她就走了

translation.en: Last I heard, she was in Colorado. I think it was Colorado.
translation.zh: 上次听说她是在科罗拉多州 应该是科罗拉多州吧

translation.en: Uncle T!
translation.zh: 泰叔！

translation.en: [John B] That's Uncle T.
translation.zh: 那是泰叔

translation.en: Since Dad's vanished, he's supposedly my legal guardian.
translation.zh: 自从爸爸人间蒸发后 他理应是我的法定监护人

translation.en: At the moment, he's in Mississippi, building houses...
translation.zh: 目前他正在密西西比盖房子…

translation.en: -[John B] Hey. -[Pope] Oy.
translation.zh: 天哪

translation.en: ...which means it's just me right now, on my own, hangin' out with my friends.
translation.zh: …也就是说 现在就我自己 自给自足 和朋友们一起

translation.en: Three months after my dad was missing, he was officially presumed dead.
translation.zh: 我爸失踪三个月后 官方假定他已经死亡

translation.en: I refused to sign the papers.
translation.zh: 我拒绝签署文件

translation.en: Until I see a body, I'm not giving up.
translation.zh: 除非看到尸体 否则我不会放弃

translation.en: John, it's come to our attention
translation.zh: 约翰 我们注意到

translation.en: that you are an unemancipated minor living on your own. [sighs]
translation.zh: 你是独自生活的未成年人

translation.en: [scoffs] No... No.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: [social worker] I need honesty to help you.
translation.zh: 约翰 你得诚实我才能帮你

translation.en: -That's what we want, right? -[John B] Yeah.
translation.zh: 我们都希望如此 对吧？

translation.en: I'm being honest.
translation.zh: 我很诚实

translation.en: Okay, then when is the last time you spoke to your uncle?
translation.zh: 好吧 那你上次和叔叔说话 是什么时候？

translation.en: Uh... 34 minutes ago.
translation.zh: 34分钟前

translation.en: When's the last time you saw him?
translation.zh: 你上次见他是什么时候？

translation.en: Two hours and... 43 minutes ago?
translation.zh: 2小时43分钟前？

translation.en: John, we're gonna come out there tomorrow to talk to your uncle.
translation.zh: 约翰 明天我们会来找你叔叔谈

translation.en: If he's not there, we're gonna move forward with foster care.
translation.zh: 如果他不在 我们就开始找寄养家庭

translation.en: I want to assure you, we're gonna find you a safe and loving home.
translation.zh: 我向你保证 我们会给你找到一个安全温馨的家

translation.en: [John B] They actually thought I was gonna be happy to hear that.
translation.zh: 他们还真以为我听到这话会开心

translation.en: [John B] And that's where this story starts.
translation.zh: 故事就从这里开始的

translation.en: -[teens laughing] -[John B] My dad missing, my uncle MIA,
translation.zh: 我爸爸失踪 叔叔不见踪影

translation.en: and the Bride of Frankenstein threatening foster care.
translation.zh: 科学怪人的新娘 威胁要给我找寄养家庭

translation.en: [Pope] Mrs. Jefferson was the Swamp Thing.
translation.zh: 杰弗逊太太就是沼泽怪物

translation.en: -[John B] But I caught a break. -[reporter] Hurricane Agatha continues
translation.zh: 但我突然交了好运 飓风阿加莎继续朝着基尔代尔岛 不断靠近

translation.en: its steady march towards Kildare Island
translation.zh: 飓风阿加莎继续朝着基尔代尔岛 不断靠近

translation.en: -on the Outer Banks of North Carolina... -Holy shit.
translation.zh: -该岛位于北卡罗来纳州的外滩 -天哪

translation.en: [John B] Hurricane Agatha, coming in the same day DCS was supposed to do my assessment.
translation.zh: 儿童服务部准备评估我的这一天 飓风阿加莎来了

translation.en: -Hey, Howie. -[storm siren blaring]
translation.zh: 嘿 豪伊

translation.en: [man] I need some sandbags over here!
translation.zh: 我这边需要点沙袋

translation.en: [woman] We gotta board this up!
translation.zh: 这里得用木板围起来

translation.en: [woman on phone] DCS, can I help you?
translation.zh: 这里是儿童服务部 有什么能帮您？

translation.en: Yeah, uh... I think we're probably gonna have to reschedule.
translation.zh: 有 我想我们可能得重新安排了

translation.en: -It's a double overhead out there, bro. -Double overhead?
translation.zh: -浪有两倍身体高了 兄弟 -两倍身体高？

translation.en: Those aren't surfable waves, bro.
translation.zh: 这种浪不适合冲浪 兄弟

translation.en: [laughs] Says who?
translation.zh: 谁说的？

translation.en: Oh, shit!
translation.zh: 哦 该死！

translation.en: [John B] What the hell?
translation.zh: 搞什么？

translation.en: -[cell phone clicks] -No service?
translation.zh: 没信号

translation.en: No power. Great.
translation.zh: 没电 好极了

translation.en: Yo, JJ, you been outside?
translation.zh: 哟 JJ 你出去过了？

translation.en: [JJ] I have polio, bro. I can't walk.
translation.zh: 我有小儿麻痹症 兄弟 我不能走路

translation.en: [John B yawning] Oh, man.
translation.zh: 哦 天

translation.en: That's no good.
translation.zh: 这不太妙

translation.en: That is not good.
translation.zh: 不妙

translation.en: [John B] Oh, man.
translation.zh: 哦 天

translation.en: -[JJ] Agatha did some work, huh? -[John B] Yeah, she did.
translation.zh: -飓风阿加莎杀伤力很大嘛 -是的 没错

translation.en: [JJ] What you thinkin'?
translation.zh: 你在想什么？

translation.en: I'm thinkin' that storm surge pushed all the crabs out on the marsh maze.
translation.zh: 我想风暴潮把螃蟹都冲到沼泽里了

translation.en: All those drum are gonna chase the crab.
translation.zh: 所有的鼓鱼都会来追螃蟹

translation.en: What about the DCS? Wasn't that today?
translation.zh: 儿童服务部怎么办？不是今天来吗？

translation.en: Nah, they're not gettin' on a ferry.
translation.zh: 不 他们上不了渡轮

translation.en: Come on, think about it.
translation.zh: 拜托 想想看

translation.en: It's God tellin' us to fish.
translation.zh: 上帝告诉我们该捕鱼了

translation.en: -[JJ] Yeah. -[John B] It's kind of a smuggler's boat.
translation.zh: -对 -对 这是走私者的船

translation.en: Uh... Good mornin'!
translation.zh: 早上好！

translation.en: [JJ] Sure hope Guffy's boat didn't sink.
translation.zh: 希望格菲的船没沉

translation.en: -He doesn't have insurance. -[John B] Yeah.
translation.zh: 他没买保险 老兄

translation.en: Hi, Miss Amy! You guys get through it?
translation.zh: 嗨 艾米小姐！你们挺过来了？

translation.en: [Amy] Still here.
translation.zh: 我们还活着呢！

translation.en: -[JJ] She totally looked at me. -[John B] I saw it.
translation.zh: 她在盯着我看 我看到了

translation.en: -Dude, look at this place. -[JJ whistles]
translation.zh: 伙计 瞧瞧这地方

translation.en: -Agatha, what did you do? -[John B] She is a crazy lady.
translation.zh: 飓风阿加莎 你干了什么？ 它真是个疯女人

translation.en: -[JJ] Hard-core. -Phew.
translation.zh: 重口味 兄弟

translation.en: -[JJ] Hurricane surge. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -飓风潮 -是啊

translation.en: -[JJ] We'll be cleaning this all summer. -[John B] That is my nightmare.
translation.zh: -整个夏天我们得清理这里 -真是我的噩梦

translation.en: -Well, look who we have here. -[JJ whoops]
translation.zh: 瞧瞧这是谁

translation.en: [John B] We have a safety meeting. Attendance mandatory.
translation.zh: 要召开安全会议 必须出席

translation.en: -[mimics static] -I can't. My pop's got me on lockdown.
translation.zh: 我来不了 我爸爸把我禁足了

translation.en: Come on, man. [mimics static]
translation.zh: 来吧 伙计

translation.en: Your dad's a pussy. Over.
translation.zh: 你爸爸是个胆小鬼 完毕

translation.en: Oh, I heard that, you little bastard.
translation.zh: 哦 我听见了 你这个小杂种

translation.en: -We need your son. -[JJ] Yeah, and island rules.
translation.zh: -我们需要你儿子 -对 岛上的规矩

translation.en: Day after a hurricane's a free day.
translation.zh: 飓风来袭后 次日放假

translation.en: -[Heyward] Who made that up? -[JJ] Uh...
translation.zh: 谁他妈订的规矩？

translation.en: Pentagon, I think. We have security clearance.
translation.zh: 我想是五角大楼吧 我们有安全权限

translation.en: -I have a card. -[Heyward] Think I'm stupid?
translation.zh: -我有张卡 -你们把我当笨蛋？

translation.en: -I'll do it tomorrow. I promise. Tomorrow. -You think-- No, no.
translation.zh: 我明天会做 我保证明天会做 不 绝对不行 你现在就做

translation.en: Hell no. You doin' it right now.
translation.zh: 不 绝对不行 你现在就做

translation.en: -[whispers] Get in the boat. -[JJ] Make a run for it.
translation.zh: -上船来 -跑起来 兄弟

translation.en: -Boy, if you get in that boat-- -[JJ] How does that feel?
translation.zh: -如果你…小子 如果你上船… -感觉如何？

translation.en: -Go, go, go. -Bring your ass back up here. -I promise I'll do it tomorrow, Dad. -Whoo!
translation.zh: -走！我保证明天会做 爸爸 -给我滚回来

translation.en: [Heyward] You gonna clean shrimp,
translation.zh: 等你回来 你要清理小虾

translation.en: -clean fish. -Love you, Pops.
translation.zh: -清理鱼 -爱你 爸爸

translation.en: -You'll clean your dirty-ass room! -We'll bring him back in one piece.
translation.zh: -你要打扫你脏兮兮的房间！ -我们会把他完璧归赵的

translation.en: -I promise! -And I don't like your friends!
translation.zh: -我答应你 -我不喜欢你的朋友！

translation.en: [JJ] Oh, top o' the mornin' to ya.
translation.zh: 哦 早上好啊

translation.en: -Good morning. -[John B] Morning.
translation.zh: -早啊 帅哥们 -你拿的什么？

translation.en: [Pope] Whatcha got? You got some juice boxes?
translation.zh: -早啊 帅哥们 -你拿的什么？ 果汁箱？

translation.en: [Kie] You know, just some yogurts and carrot sticks.
translation.zh: 你知道的 就是一些酸奶和胡萝卜条

translation.en: -How about my kind of juice box? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -我的果汁箱怎么样呢？ -是的

translation.en: [John B] Brace for impact.
translation.zh: 做好准备 迎接冲击

translation.en: -[Kie] Salud. -[JJ] Skoal.
translation.zh: 干杯 干杯

translation.en: -[glasses clink] -[JJ] Tell the world. A party trick.
translation.zh: -我们的生活太美妙了 -我给你们看个绝技

translation.en: Terrifying. [JJ] Hey, Pope. Can you go a little faster?
translation.zh: -吓死我了 -嘿 教皇 能再快点吗？

translation.en: -Here we go. I'm movin'. -[Pope] Doesn't work.
translation.zh: -天 来吧 我走了 -行不通

translation.en: -We've tried this like 6,000 times. -[JJ] I got this. It's gonna work!
translation.zh: -我们试过无数次了 -我能行！可以的！

translation.en: -[Kie] You're getting beer in my hair! -[Pope] Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 哦 我的天！ 你把啤酒弄我头发上了！

translation.en: All right. All right!
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: -[John B] All right, you're done. -[Pope] All right, stop!
translation.zh: -好吧 你完了 -好了 JJ 停下！

translation.en: -[Kie] Jesus, Pope! -[groans]
translation.zh: 老天 教皇！

translation.en: -[groans] -[John B] You okay, JJ?
translation.zh: 你没事吧 JJ？

translation.en: I think my heels touched the back of my head.
translation.zh: 我感觉脚后跟磕到后脑勺了

translation.en: -[groaning] -Kie, you okay?
translation.zh: 小琪 你没事吧？

translation.en: -[Kie] I'm all right. -[all moaning]
translation.zh: 我没事

translation.en: [JJ] Pope, what did you do?
translation.zh: 教皇 你做什么了？

translation.en: [Pope] Sandbar. The channel changed.
translation.zh: 沙洲 水道改变了

translation.en: No shit.
translation.zh: 不是吧

translation.en: Ugh, this is probably gonna mess this whole place up.
translation.zh: 风暴潮可能把整个地方都搞得一团糟

translation.en: -[JJ] Hey, I saved the beer, though. -[John B] Congrats, JJ.
translation.zh: 嘿 但我把啤酒救下来了 祝贺你 JJ

translation.en: Guys... I think there's a boat down there.
translation.zh: 大伙儿…我觉得下面有艘船

translation.en: -Shut up. What? -[Kie] No way.
translation.zh: 闭嘴吧 -不可能 -什么？

translation.en: No, no, guys. I'm serious. There's a boat down there.
translation.zh: 不 各位 我说真的 下面真的有艘船

translation.en: -For real. -[John B] Guys... is this...
translation.zh: 下面真的有艘船

translation.en: It's a boat!
translation.zh: 有艘船！

translation.en: [Kie] Holy shit, he's right. Let's go.
translation.zh: 天哪 他说得对！ 我们下去吧

translation.en: [Pope] You think there's a dead body down there?
translation.zh: 你们觉得下面有尸体吗？

translation.en: -Guys, wait up! -[Kie] Whoo!
translation.zh: 大家等一下！

translation.en: -[JJ] Get your ass in here! -[John B] Come on!
translation.zh: -快下来 教皇！ -快点！

translation.en: -[gasps] You guys saw that? -[Pope] Yeah. -Yeah, I did. -[John B] Yeah.
translation.zh: -你们看到了 对吧？ -是的

translation.en: That's a Grady-White.
translation.zh: 是艘格帝威钓鱼艇

translation.en: A new one of those is like 500 Gs, easy.
translation.zh: 一艘新船的价格能高达50万美元

translation.en: -Okay! -[JJ] That's a primo rig.
translation.zh: 船具装备很高级

translation.en: Yeah. That's the boat I saw when I surfed the surge.
translation.zh: 对 发生风暴潮时 我在冲浪 看到了那艘船

translation.en: -Maybe it hit the jetty or something. -You surfed the surge?
translation.zh: -可能撞上了防波堤之类的 -发生风暴潮时 你在冲浪？

translation.en: -[John B] Yeah. -That's my boy. Pogue style.
translation.zh: 这才对嘛 小鱼儿风格 伙计

translation.en: [Kie] What the heck?
translation.zh: 搞什么？

translation.en: Wait, wait. Do we know whose boat that is?
translation.zh: 等等 我们知道这是谁的船吗？

translation.en: [John B] No, but we're about to find out.
translation.zh: 不 但我们会弄清楚的

translation.en: [JJ] Dude, it's too deep.
translation.zh: 哥们 太深了

translation.en: Oh, for the weak and feeble, JJ.
translation.zh: 噢 对弱不禁风的人来说 JJ

translation.en: [JJ] Well, I'm not resuscitating you. I'm just making that clear up front.
translation.zh: 我可不会给你做心脏复苏 先说清楚

translation.en: [John B] That's fine.
translation.zh: 没事

translation.en: -John B. -[chuckles] What?
translation.zh: -小约翰 -什么？

translation.en: -[Pope] Diver down, fool. -[John B sighs]
translation.zh: 怒海潜将 笨蛋

translation.en: -Diver down. [grunts] -Yeah, he is.
translation.zh: -怒海潜将 -对 他是笨蛋

translation.en: [Pope] Should we go get him?
translation.zh: 我们要下去救他吗？

translation.en: -Oh, my God. That took forever! -Ah, jeez.
translation.zh: -哦 天 花了这么久！ -啊 天

translation.en: Any dead bodies?
translation.zh: 有死尸吗？

translation.en: -Looting potential? -[John B] No. No.
translation.zh: -有值钱的东西吗？ -没有

translation.en: I found this motel key.
translation.zh: 我找到一把汽车旅馆钥匙

translation.en: -[Pope] A key. -[John B] Yes, a key, Pope.
translation.zh: -一把钥匙 -对 一把钥匙 教皇

translation.en: [JJ] Great! We salvaged a motel key.
translation.zh: 赞！我们打捞到了一把汽车旅馆钥匙

translation.en: [Kie] Guys, we should report the wreck to the coast guard.
translation.zh: 大伙儿 我们得把沉船的事 向海岸警卫队报告

translation.en: -Maybe we'll get a finder's fee. -[JJ] Yeah, and not work all summer.
translation.zh: -说不定发现者有赏金哦 -对 整个夏天都不用工作了

translation.en: Thanks, Agatha, ya batch.
translation.zh: 感谢阿加莎 你这个贱人

translation.en: -[man] You haven't seen him since? -[woman 1] Not since before the storm.
translation.zh: -所以自那之后 你就没见过他 -风暴之后就没见过

translation.en: [man] What did the police say?
translation.zh: 警察怎么说？

translation.en: Well, they said I have to wait 24 hours before I can report anything,
translation.zh: 他们说我得等24小时才能报告

translation.en: but I know something's wrong.
translation.zh: 但我知道不太对劲

translation.en: [man] Nothing is wrong. You know, it's Scooter. He knows how to handle himself in a storm.
translation.zh: 没事的 这是斯库特 他知道怎么应对暴风雨

translation.en: [woman 1] Well, when was the last time that you saw him?
translation.zh: 那你上次见他是什么时候？

translation.en: [man] Uh, last time I saw him, he was prepping the Druthers with Sarah.
translation.zh: 上次见他的时候 他和莎拉在给“偏爱号”做准备工作

translation.en: Sarah!
translation.zh: 莎拉！

translation.en: -You seen the princess? -[woman 2] She's out back.
translation.zh: 你看到公主了吗？ 她在后面

translation.en: Let there be generators.
translation.zh: 要有发电机

translation.en: Thank God. It's like living in Nicaragua.
translation.zh: 谢天谢地 跟住在尼加拉瓜似的

translation.en: It didn't fall near the house. It completely uprooted it.
translation.zh: 它没有倒在房子附近 被完全连根拔起了

translation.en: Oh, look at this. Storm blew it right into the pool.
translation.zh: 瞧瞧这个 风暴把它直接刮到游泳池里了

translation.en: Be careful with that. Rose is gonna kill me.
translation.zh: 当心点 露丝会杀了我的

translation.en: -[worker] Yes, sir, Mr. Cameron. -I don't wanna know how much it cost.
translation.zh: -是的 先生 卡梅隆先生 -不知道这得花多少钱

translation.en: Dad, the Wi-Fi's not working. I can't post anything.
translation.zh: 爸爸 Wi-Fi坏了 我发布不了东西

translation.en: Wheezie, there was a hurricane, sweetheart.
translation.zh: 薇姿 飓风来过了 亲爱的

translation.en: [girl] No. No, no, no!
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: What is your sister doing?
translation.zh: 你姐姐在做什么？

translation.en: Saving mice.
translation.zh: 拯救老鼠

translation.en: [Cameron] I'm sorry. Sarah!
translation.zh: 对不起 莎拉！

translation.en: -[Sarah] I'm busy! -[Cameron] What are you doing?
translation.zh: -我很忙！ -你在做什么？

translation.en: The burrows filled with water from the surge.
translation.zh: 风暴潮淹了洞穴

translation.en: The birds are having a field day.
translation.zh: 鸟倾巢出动了

translation.en: [Cameron] The birds have to eat too, Sarah.
translation.zh: 鸟也得吃东西 莎拉

translation.en: [Sarah] No, it's a mouse genocide out here. No!
translation.zh: 不 这是老鼠大屠杀现场 不！

translation.en: The cycle of life is what it is, sweetheart. Now, come on.
translation.zh: 生命的轮回就是如此 亲爱的 别这样

translation.en: I can't be a part of it. First they came for the mice, Daddy.
translation.zh: 我没法参与其中 起初他们攻击老鼠 爸爸

translation.en: -I have a human being... -[Sarah] Oh, my God. -...you might help. -Hi.
translation.zh: 是的 好 但有个真人需要你帮忙

translation.en: -I'm Sarah. I'm so sorry. -[Cameron] This is Lana, Scooter's wife.
translation.zh: -我是莎拉 真抱歉 -这是拉娜格拉布斯 斯库特的妻子

translation.en: You were storm prepping with him, right?
translation.zh: 你和他在为暴风雨做准备 是吗？

translation.en: Yeah. He helped me latch the cabin on the Druthers.
translation.zh: 对 他帮我给“偏爱号”上的船舱 插门闩

translation.en: -Last night? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -昨晚？ -是的

translation.en: And did he go out after that?
translation.zh: 那之后他出去了吗？

translation.en: -From here? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -在这里之后？ -对

translation.en: -No. Are you crazy? There was a hurricane. -Well, did he say where he was going?
translation.zh: 没有 你疯了吗？有飓风 那他有说要去哪里吗？ 打过电话或提过什么吗？

translation.en: Get a phone call or mention anything?
translation.zh: 那他有说要去哪里吗？ 打过电话或提过什么吗？

translation.en: He didn't say anything to me.
translation.zh: 他什么也没对我说

translation.en: -I'm so sorry. Is he okay? -He's absolutely okay.
translation.zh: 我很遗憾 他还好吗？ 他一点事儿也没有

translation.en: -I hope so. -[Cameron] He's hunkered down somewhere.
translation.zh: 他只是在某个地方待着 好吗？

translation.en: -We'll find him. -[Sarah] Sorry.
translation.zh: -我们会找到他 -我很遗憾

translation.en: -Thank you. -[Cameron] He's hunkered down
translation.zh: 谢谢 他肯定待在某个地方喝啤酒

translation.en: -somewhere with a six-pack... -[seabirds calling]
translation.zh: 他肯定待在某个地方喝啤酒

translation.en: [man 1] She doesn't need to talk to the coast guard. It's a dog.
translation.zh: 她不必报告海岸警卫队 那是一条狗

translation.en: How about the Humane Society?
translation.zh: 那人道协会呢？

translation.en: [woman] He's diabetic!
translation.zh: 我很紧张！

translation.en: -He's a-- he's a diabetic! -[man 1] ...a dog... -No, I understand that. -Excuse me!
translation.zh: -它有糖尿病！ -我明白

translation.en: Excuse me. Hey, man, we-- we found a boat.
translation.zh: -不好意思！ -嘿 伙计 我们发现了一艘船

translation.en: -You're gonna wanna hear this. -Hey! Calm down.
translation.zh: -你肯定想知道 -嘿！冷静点

translation.en: -Now-- -Canine diabetes is very...
translation.zh: -现在… -狗患糖尿病是非常致命的

translation.en: -[man 1] Oh, my gosh. Diabetes for a dog? -[woman] It is so true!
translation.zh: -哦 我的天 狗有糖尿病？ -事实就是如此！

translation.en: [man 2] Your boat? We're not worried about your boat right now, okay?
translation.zh: 我们现在不关心你的船 好吗？

translation.en: Well, that went well.
translation.zh: 真顺利

translation.en: So, what's the plan?
translation.zh: 有什么计划？

translation.en: I know how we're gonna find the guy who owns that boat.
translation.zh: 我想我知道怎么找到船主

translation.en: We don't know whose room that is. It could be anyone.
translation.zh: 我们不知道这是谁的房间 谁都可能是屋主

translation.en: -I'm in. -Come on. I'll be lookout.
translation.zh: -我加入 -来吧 我放哨

translation.en: [John B] Finder's fee. Just sayin'.
translation.zh: 发现者有赏金 说说而已

translation.en: And, hey, at least you'll only be an accomplice.
translation.zh: 嘿 至少你只会是共犯

translation.en: -Man. -[John B] Come on, bubba.
translation.zh: 天 来吧 老弟

translation.en: [JJ whistles] I thought the Château looked bad.
translation.zh: 我还以为城堡看来就够糟

translation.en: -[John B] This place is a shitshow. -[Kie] Motel or meth lab?
translation.zh: 这地方惨不忍睹 汽车旅馆还是冰毒作坊？

translation.en: [Pope] You be the judge.
translation.zh: 你说呢？

translation.en: [John B] Doesn't look like a place somebody with a Grady-White stays.
translation.zh: 格帝威钓鱼艇的人不会住在这种地方

translation.en: [Pope] No. Looks like a place someone with a Grady-White would get killed.
translation.zh: 不 有格帝威钓鱼艇的人 有可能在这种地方被杀掉

translation.en: All right. Here we go.
translation.zh: 来吧

translation.en: [JJ] This is your captain speaking. HMS Pogue comin' in for landing.
translation.zh: 我是船长 HMS小鱼儿号要登陆了

translation.en: -[John B] We good? -Yeah, we good.
translation.zh: -可以吗？ -是 可以了

translation.en: [John B] All right. Here goes nothin'.
translation.zh: 好了 什么都没有

translation.en: -Hey. -[John B] Yeah?
translation.zh: -嘿 -什么？

translation.en: Don't let him do anything stupid.
translation.zh: 别让他犯蠢

translation.en: -Oh, we will. -I'm not making promises.
translation.zh: -噢 我们会的 -我不做承诺

translation.en: Yeah, I know.
translation.zh: 对 我知道

translation.en: Uh, be careful.
translation.zh: 当心点

translation.en: I mean it.
translation.zh: 我认真的

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Let's go.
translation.zh: 我们走吧

translation.en: Why are all these mattresses out?
translation.zh: 床垫怎么都在外面？

translation.en: [JJ] After a hurricane, they ditch 'em 'cause they're moldy.
translation.zh: 飓风之后都得扔掉 因为会发霉

translation.en: Just be so careful, John.
translation.zh: 一定要小心啊 约翰

translation.en: -God, you're so weird. -What was that about?
translation.zh: -天 你真古怪 -这又是哪一出？

translation.en: I don't know. Maybe she wants us to be careful.
translation.zh: 我不知道 也许她希望我们当心点

translation.en: Since she heard you're being threatened with exile, she's just been, like,
translation.zh: 自从她听说有人威胁 要把你送去别的地方 她就一直

translation.en: -"Oh! Be so careful, John B." -[John B] Get off.
translation.zh: “噢 一定要当心 小约翰

translation.en: [JJ] "Oh, give me that John D already." When are you gonna swoop on that, man?
translation.zh: 把你的小弟弟给我” 你打算什么时候扑上去 兄弟？

translation.en: Bro, you know the rule. No Pogue-on-Pogue macking.
translation.zh: 兄弟 你知道规矩 小鱼儿不泡小鱼儿

translation.en: -You're the one always hitting on her. -Of course I'm hitting on her.
translation.zh: -你才是一直勾引她那一个 -我当然勾引她

translation.en: She's a super-hot, rich, hippie chick slumming with us.
translation.zh: 她超正点 有钱又嬉皮 跟我们一起混

translation.en: Why? I can't figure it out either, but who cares, bro?
translation.zh: 为什么？我也想不明白 但谁在乎呢 兄弟？

translation.en: I know that door's locked because I've tried it. Have you?
translation.zh: 我知道那扇门是锁上的 因为我试过了 你呢？

translation.en: -[power tools whirring] -You need help.
translation.zh: 你需要帮助

translation.en: Not a little help, you need a lot of help.
translation.zh: 不是一点帮助 是许多帮助

translation.en: It's like every girl who just has a heartbeat, you're like... "Uhh!"
translation.zh: 因为只要是活着的女孩 你都会…

translation.en: -What? It's not a big deal. -Is that us? Twenty-nine.
translation.zh: 什么？这没什么大不了 29

translation.en: -This is it. -Okay.
translation.zh: 就是这里 好吧

translation.en: [high-pitched] Housekeeping.
translation.zh: 客房服务

translation.en: -[John B] Should we try it? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -要试试吗？ -是的

translation.en: No power. No security cameras. No one's gonna know.
translation.zh: 没有电 没监控摄像头 没人会知道

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: Check the bag. See if there's a name on there somewhere.
translation.zh: 检查包 看看包上是否有名字

translation.en: -[JJ] A jacket. -[John B] Denim slides.
translation.zh: -我找到一件夹克 -牛仔拖鞋

translation.en: No name on the jacket.
translation.zh: 夹克上没名字

translation.en: -It's a nice jacket, though. -Definitely over 50.
translation.zh: -但夹克真不错 -肯定超过50块了

translation.en: He's got New Balances.
translation.zh: 他还有新百伦

translation.en: [JJ] Yo, dude, come here. Maybe this is where they were fishing.
translation.zh: 哟 哥们 过来 这可能是他们钓鱼的地方

translation.en: -[John B] Let me see. -Right there.
translation.zh: -我看看 -你知道 在那里？

translation.en: [John B] No, that's off the continental shelf.
translation.zh: 不 那不在大陆架上

translation.en: -That's Big Swell. Nobody fishes there. -[JJ] Okay.
translation.zh: 那是大海潮 没人去那里钓鱼

translation.en: -[John B] Coffee? -Yeah.
translation.zh: 咖啡？ 是的

translation.en: Standard. Tissues for when you get lonely...
translation.zh: 孤单寂寞时打手枪会用的卫生纸

translation.en: -Ooh! -[John B] Did you find anything?
translation.zh: 找到什么了吗？

translation.en: A really awesome Dopp kit you won't let me steal.
translation.zh: 一个超赞的洗漱包 你肯定不准我偷

translation.en: [John B] Yeah, 'cause we're not stealing shit.
translation.zh: 对 因为我们不是来偷东西的

translation.en: -One, one, one. -[safe beeping]
-Biggest pet peeve? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -最无法忍的事？ -对

translation.en: Easy. Giving one percent to the environment.
translation.zh: 简单 给环境1%

translation.en: -What's wrong with that? -We only have one Earth, Pope.
translation.zh: -这有什么问题？ -我们只有一个地球 教皇

translation.en: We should be giving it 100 percent, bare minimum.
translation.zh: 我们应该100%都给它 最低要求

translation.en: Right. That's not fiscally sound.
translation.zh: 好吧 这在财政上行不通

translation.en: [Kie] Neither is destroying the planet we have to live on.
translation.zh: 摧毁我们唯一赖以生存的地球 在财政上也行不通

translation.en: [Pope] Hey, hey, cops.
translation.zh: 嘿 有警察！

translation.en: -Shit. -Call them.
translation.zh: -该死！ -给他们打电话

translation.en: I can't. Towers are down.
translation.zh: 没办法 信号塔倒了

translation.en: If I lose my merit scholarship, I'm gonna kill someone.
translation.zh: 要是优秀奖学金丢了 我要杀人

translation.en: -Maybe they're not going up. Maybe-- -[officer 2] Okay.

translation.zh: 托佩尔！

translation.en: Topper, stop! No!
translation.zh: 托佩尔 停下！不！

translation.en: [Pope] No!
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: -I know. -He's drowning him.
translation.zh: -我知道 -他快淹死他了

translation.en: Topper!
translation.zh: 托佩尔！

translation.en: Yeah, you know what that is.
translation.zh: 对 你知道这是什么

translation.en: Your move, broski.
translation.zh: 到你了 朋友

translation.en: -Come on. Chill, dude! -JJ!
translation.zh: -他有枪！ -别这样 冷静 伙计！

translation.en: -[Pope] Chill! -[Sarah] Stop! JJ!
translation.zh: 住手！JJ！

translation.en: -Put the gun down. -Did you say somethin', princess?
translation.zh: -把枪放下 -你说什么 公主？

translation.en: -[Topper] We're good. We're good. -Put the gun down!
translation.zh: -我们没事 -把枪放下！

translation.en: All right? Come on, man!
translation.zh: -好吗？ -来吧 伙计

translation.en: Kie! Can you check your psycho friend, please?
translation.zh: 琪！管管你的神经病朋友 好吗？

translation.en: Okay, everyone, listen up! Get the hell off our side of the island!
translation.zh: 好的 大家都听着！ 岛上的这一边是我们的地盘 快滚

translation.en: -Are you crazy? You idiot! -Stupid!
translation.zh: -你疯了吗？你这个白痴！ -笨蛋！

translation.en: -Why do that? -It's not worth it! -I'm saving his life, okay? -Stupid!
translation.zh: -你为什么那样做？ -我救了他的命 好吗？

translation.en: -You're gonna jeopardize everything! -[panting]
translation.zh: 笨蛋 你会把一切都毁了！

translation.en: [John B] There's something about my father I haven't mentioned.
translation.zh: 关于我爸 有件事我没提起

translation.en: The week before he went missing, he says to me,
translation.zh: 他消失之前那周 他对我说

translation.en: "Bird, I think I found something.
translation.zh: “小鸟 我想我发现了些东西

translation.en: Your Uncle T's gonna come stay for a while.
translation.zh: 你泰叔会来小住一段

translation.en: I might have to vanish for a bit."
translation.zh: 我可能得消失一阵子”

translation.en: So, he talks about vanishing,
translation.zh: 所以他说自己会消失

translation.en: and he vanishes.
translation.zh: 然后就消失了

translation.en: Everyone says he was lost at sea, but...
translation.zh: 大家都说他在海上失踪了 但…

translation.en: he's still out there. I know it.
translation.zh: 他还在某个地方 我知道

translation.en: Get decent, sweetie. We need to talk.
translation.zh: 打扮一下 亲爱的 我们得谈谈

translation.en: Sorry to break in like this, but DCS called.
translation.zh: 抱歉这样闯进来 但儿童服务部打电话来了

translation.en: They wanted me to check on you. See how you're doin'.
translation.zh: 他们要我查看一下你的情况

translation.en: So, how are you, besides the--
translation.zh: 你怎么样 除了…

translation.en: Oh, no, I'm-- I'm great. Yeah, fantastic. Uh...
translation.zh: 噢 我很好 对 好极了

translation.en: Thanks for comin' by.
translation.zh: 谢谢你过来

translation.en: I'm so glad to hear you say that, John B, but I heard a few things that worried me.
translation.zh: 很高兴听到你这样说 小约翰 但我听说了几件事 有点担心

translation.en: Let me see if I can remember.
translation.zh: 我看看能不能想起来

translation.en: Oh, yeah.
translation.zh: 哦 对了

translation.en: One of the things I heard was that your Uncle Teddy, your guardian,
translation.zh: 我听说你泰迪叔叔 你的监护人

translation.en: hasn't been in the state for three months.
translation.zh: 连续三个月都没来过本州

translation.en: -That's false. -You don't have to say anything.
translation.zh: -那是假的 -你什么也不用说

translation.en: I know it's true. I called the school.
translation.zh: 我知道这是真的 我给学校打电话了

translation.en: They said you used to be a good student, but now you're failin' all your classes.
translation.zh: 他们说你以前是个好学生 但现在所有科目的都挂科了

translation.en: No. No, I'm only failing one, and it's history.
translation.zh: 不 我只有一科挂了 是历史

translation.en: -He's a dick. He's out for me-- -[sheriff] I heard
translation.zh: -那家伙是个混蛋 专门针对我 -我听说昨天在沙滩上

translation.en: there was a fight on the beach yesterday,
translation.zh: -那家伙是个混蛋 专门针对我 -我听说昨天在沙滩上 有人打架

translation.en: -and a gun was involved. -Okay. Gun?
translation.zh: 有人还涉嫌用枪 好吧 枪？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: Did I get in a dustup? Yes, but was there a gun?
translation.zh: 我有没有打架？有 但有一把枪？

translation.en: [scoffs] No. No way.
translation.zh: 不 不可能

translation.en: [sheriff] That's okay. I know who it was. I'll get to him.
translation.zh: 没问题 我知道那人是谁 我会去找他

translation.en: All I'm worried about right now is makin' sure you're in a safe home.
translation.zh: 我现在关心的是 确保你住在一个安全的家里

translation.en: [scoffs] Yeah, super safe. -Super sound, sturdy. You know? -[taps table]
translation.zh: 是的 超级安全 超级完善 坚固 你懂我的意思吧？

translation.en: -Uncle T's coming, so... -[sheriff] That what he told you?
translation.zh: -泰叔要回来了 所以… -他这么告诉你的？

translation.en: -Yeah. -[sheriff] If he is coming,
translation.zh: -是的 -如果他真的要回家了

translation.en: I think you should be allowed to stay.
translation.zh: 我想你应该可以留下来

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢你

translation.en: But if I stick my neck out for you, you have to help me.
translation.zh: 但如果我为你冒险 你也得帮我

translation.en: Tit for tat.
translation.zh: 礼尚往来

translation.en: What-- what does tat mean?
translation.zh: 这话是什么意思？

translation.en: Let me see, how can you help me? Oh, I know.
translation.zh: 让我想想你能怎么帮我？ 哦 我知道

translation.en: So, a body was found in the marsh yesterday.
translation.zh: 昨天有人在沼泽里发现了一具尸体

translation.en: Were you in the marsh yesterday?
translation.zh: 你昨天在沼泽吗？

translation.en: -Yeah, we were fishin' for some drum. -You catch anything?
translation.zh: -是的 我们在钓鼓鱼 -钓到了吗？

translation.en: Nah, we were skunked.
translation.zh: 没 空手而归

translation.en: [sheriff] Strange. Fishing's usually good after a storm.
translation.zh: 奇怪 暴风雨后通常很容易钓到鱼

translation.en: All sorts of things get stirred up.
translation.zh: 一切都被搅乱了

translation.en: You come across a wreck yesterday?
translation.zh: 昨天你我无意间发现了一艘沉船？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: You skimmin' just above the surface, John B.
translation.zh: 你刚好待在水面之上 小约翰

translation.en: Now, down here is foster care, juvie.
translation.zh: 这以下是寄养家庭 少管所

translation.en: Pretty big drop for a smart kid like you.
translation.zh: 对你这样聪明的孩子可太糟了

translation.en: Up here is you and your little friends doing whatever you want.
translation.zh: 在上面你和你的小朋友们 可以为所欲为

translation.en: Outer Banks...
translation.zh: 外滩…

translation.en: or foster care on the mainland.
translation.zh: 还是内陆的寄宿家庭

translation.en: You one inch above the surface, John B.
translation.zh: 你就高出水面那么一点点 小约翰

translation.en: If I was you, I'd start flappin' my wings.
translation.zh: 如果我是你 就会开始扑腾翅膀

translation.en: Now, you sure you didn't come across a wreck yesterday?
translation.zh: 你确定昨天没有无意间 发现一艘沉船？

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, I'm sure.
translation.zh: 是的 我确定

translation.en: It's better if you didn't, you understand?
translation.zh: 你最好没有 明白吗？

translation.en: I'm gonna look the other way, as long as you stay out of the marsh.
translation.zh: 只要你不靠近沼泽 我就不会找你麻烦

translation.en: I got dogs livin' better than this, John B.
translation.zh: 我的狗住的地方都比这里好 小约翰

translation.en: You might wanna think about cleanin' up.
translation.zh: 也许你该考虑打扫一下

translation.en: [John B] Look, I'm callin' it off. All right?
translation.zh: 听着 我要取消行动 好吗？

translation.en: Peterkin said, if I stay out of the marsh, she'll help me with DCS.
translation.zh: 彼得金说如果我远离沼泽 她就帮我对付儿童服务部

translation.en: -[JJ] And you believed her? -Yes, I believe her, JJ.
translation.zh: 你相信她？ 是的 我相信她 JJ

translation.en: An actual cop, John B. You believed a cop.
translation.zh: 一个名副其实的警察 小约翰 你相信警察

translation.en: All I gotta do is stay out of the marsh for a couple days, and she'll help me out.
translation.zh: 我只需要远离沼泽几天 她就会帮我

translation.en: It doesn't help that your ass was the one shooting a gun.
translation.zh: 帮不上忙的是你开枪了

translation.en: You know what I should have done? Just let Topper drown your ass.
translation.zh: 你知道我该做什么吗？ 我该让托佩尔淹死你

translation.en: -[John B] Topper was gonna drown me? -[JJ] Sure looked like it.
translation.zh: -对 因为托佩尔会淹死我？ -看起来就是

translation.en: -[John B] Funny. -[JJ] Have you looked in a mirror?
translation.zh: -你最近有照镜子吗？ -继续 再多说点

translation.en: -[John B] Tell me some more. Come on. -They always win, don't they, man?
translation.zh: -你最近有照镜子吗？ -继续 再多说点 他们总是赢 不是吗 伙计？

translation.en: Kooks versus Pogues. They always, always win!
translation.zh: 鲨鱼对小鱼儿 他们总是赢！

translation.en: -Goddamn! -[Kie] Look, it's okay!
translation.zh: -该死！ -听着 这没关系！

translation.en: No, it's not okay!
translation.zh: 不 这有关系！

translation.en: It is not! They don't want us to go down into the marsh.
translation.zh: 有关系！他们不想我们去沼泽

translation.en: That means there's something valuable down there, and you know it.
translation.zh: 意味着那里有值钱的东西 你知道的

translation.en: I know you do. And I understand why you don't wanna go.
translation.zh: 我知道你知道 我明白你为什么不想去

translation.en: You're the golden boy. You got way too much to risk. And you--
translation.zh: 你人气旺 又成功 不能随便就冒险 而你…

translation.en: I mean, you're already rich as fuck anyway.
translation.zh: 我是说 反正你已经富得流油了

translation.en: Why would you bother?
translation.zh: 何必冒险呢？

translation.en: But you and me, man, we got nothin' to lose!
translation.zh: 但兄弟 你和我 我们一无所有

translation.en: -We really don't, all right? -JJ.
translation.zh: -我们真的如此 好吗？ -JJ

translation.en: [JJ] And I know it didn't use to be that way for you.
translation.zh: 我也知道你过去不是这样

translation.en: I don't want to talk about this. I don't want to talk about it.
translation.zh: 我不想讨论这个 我不想讨论这个

translation.en: -[JJ] So that's it? -Just get out of my way, bro.
translation.zh: -那就这样 -别挡着 兄弟

translation.en: [JJ] John B, listen to me. I have a plan.
translation.zh: 小约翰 听我说 我有个计划

translation.en: You got the key to Cameron's big boat, right?
translation.zh: 你有卡梅隆大船的钥匙 对吧？

translation.en: -[John B] No. -There's scuba gear.
translation.zh: -不 JJ -里面有潜水装备

translation.en: We borrow that, and then we go down to the wreck this afternoon,
translation.zh: 我们借装备 然后今天下午潜到沉船那里

translation.en: and that is what's gonna save you, man.
translation.zh: 这才能救你 兄弟

translation.en: You don't see rich kids going into foster care, do you?
translation.zh: 没见过有钱人的孩子去寄养家庭吧？

translation.en: [John B] You know, I should have learned a long time ago to never listen to JJ.
translation.zh: 我早该懂得绝不能听JJ的话

translation.en: He's full of bad ideas, like stealing from my rich boss.
translation.zh: 他一肚子馊主意 比如从我有钱的老板那儿偷东西

translation.en: -But this time, he was right. -♪ Only dem alon invited ♪
translation.zh: 但这次他是对的

translation.en: -[John B] I had nothing to lose. -♪ Karina and Sabrina ♪
translation.zh: 我一无所有

translation.en: [John B] My dad said the island was America on steroids.
translation.zh: 我爸说这岛就像打了激素的美国

translation.en: The haves and have-nots like anyplace, but magnified and multiplied.
translation.zh: 和别处一样有富人和穷人 但差距放大和翻倍

translation.en: The way I see it, the game's rigged. Maybe it always has been.
translation.zh: 在我看来 游戏被人操控了 或许向来如此

translation.en: -No parents, money... -[Sarah] Cheers! ...and no one looking out for me,
translation.zh: 没有父母、没钱、没人照顾我

translation.en: I got no chance...
translation.zh: 我没有机会…

translation.en: -♪ Up inna har belly weh mi sen it ♪ -...unless I make it on my own.
translation.zh: 除非我自己创造机会

translation.en: -♪ Me bad her up ♪ -Oh! Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: Are you stalking us? Plotting your revenge?
translation.zh: 你在跟踪我们？策划报复吗？

translation.en: Yeah. Why don't you just tell your daddy I blew the bilge on Druthers?
translation.zh: 是啊 为什么不告诉你爸 我把偏爱号的舱底弄坏了？

translation.en: Everything's good to go. Just toppin' off these tanks.
translation.zh: 都准备好了 去把氧气罐装满

translation.en: [Sarah] Hey, are you okay?
translation.zh: 嘿 你没事吧？

translation.en: 'Cause that eye of yours looks really gnarly.
translation.zh: 因为你的眼神看起来不太对劲

translation.en: [John B] You know what?
translation.zh: 对 你知道吗？

translation.en: You can tell Topper he won the first round.
translation.zh: 你可以告诉托佩尔他赢了第一局

translation.en: I'll get him next time.
translation.zh: 下次我会打败他

translation.en: So there's just gonna be a reign of terror on this island now?
translation.zh: 所以现在岛上要开始恐怖统治了？

translation.en: Wars have been started for less, Sarah Cameron.
translation.zh: 更小的事情都能引发战争 莎拉卡梅隆

translation.en: Okay. Can we drop the whole Pogues versus Kooks thing?
translation.zh: 好吧 我们能放下 小鱼儿和鲨鱼之争吗？

translation.en: It is really stupid.
translation.zh: 这真的很愚蠢

translation.en: You know, it's easy to say when you're a Kook.
translation.zh: 你是鲨鱼 这么说当然容易

translation.en: [deputy on megaphone] Are y'all ready for a water party today?
translation.zh: 大家准备好 参加今天的水上派对了吗？

translation.en: [chuckles] All right. Now, all kiddin' aside,
translation.zh: 好吧 玩笑开完了

translation.en: your job today is to help keep privates off the marsh
translation.zh: 你们今天的工作是让私人船只 别靠近沼泽

translation.en: so we can do our job and find this wreck.
translation.zh: 好让我们开展工作 找到沉船

translation.en: That's straight from Sheriff Peterkin.
translation.zh: 这是彼得金警长直接下达的命令

translation.en: Do not forget your sunscreen, ladies.
translation.zh: 别忘了擦防晒 女士们

translation.en: Bring a lot of liquids.
translation.zh: 多带些饮料

translation.en: [woman] Does that include Natty Light?
translation.zh: 包括啤酒吗？

translation.en: I don't care what swill you bring. That's on your own recognizance.
translation.zh: 我不在乎你带什么 你自己担保

translation.en: All right. What else do you got to worry about? Let's go!
translation.zh: 好了 你们还有什么担心？ 我们出发！

translation.en: Pull that for me, will you? Thank you, ma'am.
translation.zh: 把那个拉到前面 谢谢你 女士

translation.en: Bill, I'mma get at ya about that tomorrow, all right?
translation.zh: 比尔 我明天答复你 好吗？

translation.en: -We're here about the missing boat. -Yeah?
translation.zh: 抱歉 我们为了那艘失踪的船而来

translation.en: -What can I do for you fellas? -Associates of the owner.
translation.zh: -有什么能为你们效劳？ -船主的同事

translation.en: -Here to help however we can. -Uh-huh. Right.
translation.zh: 看看有什么我们能帮忙的

translation.en: We're devastated about Scooter. We just feel sick about it.
translation.zh: 斯库特的事让我们很伤心 我们非常难过

translation.en: You mind if we join your armada? Take a look for ourselves?
translation.zh: 介意我们加入你的搜索队吗？ 自己找找看？

translation.en: Yeah, why not? Extra set of eyes.
translation.zh: 好啊 干嘛不呢？多几双眼睛

translation.en: We'll let you know if we find anything, Officer.
translation.zh: 找到什么我们会通知你 警官

translation.en: -You do that. -[engine starts]
translation.zh: 通知我

translation.en: -This is empty. You took empty tanks? -I...
translation.zh: 是空的 你拿的空罐子？

translation.en: Okay, this one's a quarter full.
translation.zh: 好吧 这个还剩四分之一

translation.en: It's enough for one of us.
translation.zh: 只够我们中一个人用

translation.en: Love it when a plan comes together.
translation.zh: 计划慢慢形成 感觉真是太好了

translation.en: Does anybody know how to dive?
translation.zh: 有谁会潜水吗？

translation.en: -Anybody? -It's kind of a Kook sport.
translation.zh: 有谁会吗？ 这是鲨鱼们的运动

translation.en: -[sighs] -I... read about it.
translation.zh: 我在书上看到过

translation.en: Great, Pope read about it, so someone's gonna die.
translation.zh: 好极了 教皇读到过 所以有人会死

translation.en: Look, y-you put the thing in your mouth and breathe. How hard could it be?
translation.zh: 听着 你把那玩意放嘴里 然后呼吸 这能有多难？

translation.en: If you come up too fast, nitrogen gets into your blood,
translation.zh: 如果你上来太快 氮气进入血液

translation.en: and you get the bends.
translation.zh: 就会得减压症

translation.en: -Bends like, bend over and... -[Pope] The bends kill you.
translation.zh: 减什么？这样吗… 减压症会让人没命的

translation.en: -[JJ] Right. -I can-- I can dive.
translation.zh: -好吧 -我会潜水

translation.en: -[JJ] You can dive. I'm cool with that. -[Kie] Since when can you dive?
translation.zh: -对 你会潜水 我没意见 -你什么时候会潜水的？

translation.en: I'll do it. It's fine.
translation.zh: 我来吧 没事的

translation.en: -Let me do some calculations real quick. -You serious?
translation.zh: -让我快速计算一下 -你当真吗？

translation.en: -[Pope] That boat's about 30 feet down. -Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧 船在9米处 对吧？ 好的

translation.en: [Pope] So it'll take 25 minutes at that depth.
translation.zh: 最多需要25分钟潜到那里

translation.en: Twenty-five.
Which means you need to make your safety stop at about... ten feet.
translation.zh: 那意味着为了安全 潜到约3米处时要停一下

translation.en: All right? For two minutes.
translation.zh: 对吧？停2分钟

translation.en: [John B] Yeah, yeah. Ten feet, two minutes. Got it.
translation.zh: 对 3米 2分钟 懂了

translation.en: -Uh... -[Pope] What was that all about? I don't know, but I liked it. A lot.
translation.zh: -这是干嘛？ -我不知道 但我很喜欢

translation.en: -[Pope] All righty. -Yeah. Uh, when you--
translation.zh: 好吧 对 你在下面的时候 去找货舱

translation.en: uh, when you're down there, you look for the cargo hold.
translation.zh: 对 你在下面的时候 去找货舱

translation.en: You stick this thing inside and twist and pull, okay?
translation.zh: 把这玩意插进去 旋转 然后拉出来 好吧？

translation.en: -[John B] Stick in, twist, pull. -[JJ] Yeah.
translation.zh: -插进洞里 旋转然后拉 -是的

translation.en: -My dad moved weight back in the day. -[Pope] Who didn't?
translation.zh: -我爸爸以前运过毒品 -谁没有呢？

translation.en: Hey! I tied my T-shirt to the anchor chain about ten feet down.
translation.zh: 嘿！我把T恤绑到锚链约3米的地方

translation.en: It's where you need to do your safety stop.
translation.zh: 那是你做安全停留的地方

translation.en: -[John B] Cool. -[Pope] Keep an eye on this.
translation.zh: -好的 -好了 当心这个

translation.en: You need to make sure you have enough air to decompress.
translation.zh: 你得确保有足够的氧气可以减压

translation.en: Okay, how much do I need?
translation.zh: 好的 我需要多少？

translation.en: Unclear. Breathe as little as possible.
translation.zh: 不清楚 尽量少呼吸

translation.en: Zen. Think Zen, you know?
translation.zh: 禅 想想禅 你知道吗？

translation.en: -[imitates breathing through mask] -[John B] Yeah. Got it.
translation.zh: 明白了

translation.en: [Pope] Hey, if we get caught in the marsh,
translation.zh: 嘿 如果被抓到在沼泽出现 我们基本上就完蛋了

translation.en: we're basically screwed, so...
translation.zh: 嘿 如果被抓到在沼泽出现 我们基本上就完蛋了 所以最好开始吧

translation.en: -better get a move on. -[John B] Copy that.
translation.zh: 所以最好开始吧 收到

translation.en: Diver down?
translation.zh: 怒海潜将？

translation.en: Diver down.
translation.zh: 怒海潜将

translation.en: [Pope] Diver down.
translation.zh: 怒海潜将

translation.en: -All right. -[JJ] See ya, dude.
translation.zh: 好了 再见 兄弟

translation.en: Shit. JJ.
translation.zh: 该死 JJ

translation.en: Guys, that's the police.
translation.zh: 大伙儿 那是警察

translation.en: Oh, you gotta be kidding me.
translation.zh: 哦 开玩笑吧

translation.en: -[JJ] Yep, that's the police. -Just act frickin' normal.
translation.zh: 是的 是警察 他妈的表现正常点

translation.en: -Evening, officers. -Evening.
translation.zh: -晚上好 警官们 -晚上好

translation.en: -[officer] Here. -[deputy] Evening.
translation.zh: -嘿 拿着 -晚上好

translation.en: [Pope] JJ, tie it off.
translation.zh: JJ 把这个系好

translation.en: How you kids doing? You know the marsh is closed?
translation.zh: 你们这群孩子们在干什么？ 知道沼泽关闭了吗？

translation.en: -No. -No. Wow.
translation.zh: -不 我不知道 -不 我不知道这件事

translation.en: -I didn't know that. -Why-- why is it closed?
translation.zh: -不 我不知道 -不 我不知道这件事 为什么关闭了？

translation.en: Well, we're conducting a search out here. Boat went down.
translation.zh: 我们在这里进行搜索 有船沉了

translation.en: -Oh. -[deputy] Seen anything?
translation.zh: -你们看到什么了吗？ -没有

translation.en: -[JJ] No. -No boats. No.
translation.zh: -你们看到什么了吗？ -没有 没看到船 没有

translation.en: Where's your friend you always hang with? He here?
translation.zh: 经常和你们一起的那位朋友在哪儿？ 他在这里？

translation.en: He's working.
translation.zh: 他在工作

translation.en: I'm gonna check your little boat out.
translation.zh: 我要检查一下你们的小船

translation.en: -[JJ] Yeah. -[Pope] Yeah, hop aboard.
translation.zh: -好 -是的 请上船吧

translation.en: -You wanna check-- uh, check her out. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -来吧 检查一下 -谢谢

translation.en: -[deputy] Uh... you got another one? -[JJ] Yeah.
translation.zh: -这个你还有吗？ -是的 当然

translation.en: -[Pope] Yeah, yeah. -Of course. It's, uh... it's in the hold.
translation.zh: -这个你还有吗？ -是的 当然 在货舱里

translation.en: -[Pope] Yeah. -Show him.
translation.zh: -是的 -给他看

translation.en: Yeah, here we go.
translation.zh: 好的 在这里

translation.en: -All right. -[JJ] Yeah.
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: -[Pope] Uh... -[JJ] Be careful. [Pope] Be careful. You don't wanna slip.
translation.zh: 当心点 滑倒可不好

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: -All right. -All right.
translation.zh: -好的 -好的

translation.en: -[deputy] Beautiful day. -[JJ] Sure is.
translation.zh: -美好的一天 是吧？ -确实

translation.en: -[Pope] Very. -[deputy] Let us know
translation.zh: 非常美好 离开时如果看到什么 就通知我们

translation.en: if you see anything on your way out.
translation.zh: 离开时如果看到什么 就通知我们

translation.en: -Will do. Will do. -[engine starts]
translation.zh: 会的

translation.en: -[JJ] We'll be gone soon, sir. -[deputy] Yes, you will.
translation.zh: 我们很快就回去 长官 是的 你们会的

translation.en: [Pope] He's definitely out of air.
translation.zh: 他肯定没氧气了

translation.en: -[JJ] There he is! -Oh, God! Jesus Christ!
translation.zh: -他在那里 -天！老天爷！

translation.en: -Don't scare us like that! -[JJ] How'd it go down there?
translation.zh: -别这样吓我们！ -下面情况怎么样？

translation.en: Did you find anything?
translation.zh: 你找到什么了吗？

translation.en: Did I find anything?
translation.zh: 我找到什么了？

translation.en: [JJ] Yeah, there we go! That's my boy!
translation.zh: 是的 这就对了！你真棒！

translation.en: [Pope] Jeez, dude!
translation.zh: 天！哥们！

translation.en: -Dude! -Oh!
translation.zh: 哥们！

translation.en: -[Kie] You okay? -[panting] Yeah, I ran out of air.
translation.zh: 你没事吧？ 是的 没氧气了

translation.en: You scared the shit out of me.
translation.zh: 你吓死我了

translation.en: Yeah, the cops were up here, but, uh... took care of 'em.
translation.zh: 是的 警察来过 但我搞定了

translation.en: -[John B] My bad. -[Pope] You're all good.
translation.zh: -我的错 -你没事

translation.en: [JJ] Yeah, you kinda missed the show, brother.
translation.zh: 对 你错过了表演 哥们

translation.en: -Hey, guys? Guys, bogey, two o'clock. -What?
translation.zh: 嘿 大家 -有可疑船只 两点钟方向 -什么？

translation.en: -[Pope] Do you recognize that boat? -[Kie] I've never seen it.
translation.zh: -你认识那艘船？ -我从没见过

translation.en: What are they doing here? The marsh is closed.
translation.zh: 他们在那里做什么？沼泽关闭了

translation.en: [JJ] Let's not stick around and find out.
translation.zh: 我不知道 我们别留在这里 去弄清楚吧

translation.en: -JJ, get the bowline. -[JJ] Yeah.
translation.zh: -JJ 帆脚索解开了吗？ -是的

translation.en: -Should we wait on 'em? -[John B] No, we're not.
translation.zh: -我们该不该等他们？ -不 我们不等他们

translation.en: -Go get the stern. Go! -[Kie] Are you joking? JJ, hurry up.
translation.zh: -去船尾 去！ -你开玩笑吗？ JJ 快点

translation.en: -[JJ] Guys, don't wait for me. Go. -[Kie] Let's go!
translation.zh: -大家别等我 走 -我们走！

translation.en: [Pope] Pull out the stern.
translation.zh: 把船尾锚拉出来

translation.en: -I don't like this. -[JJ] Are they coming for us?
translation.zh: -我不喜欢这感觉 -他们来找我们的？

translation.en: [Pope] Maybe they're fishing.
translation.zh: 也许他们也在捕鼓鱼

translation.en: -[JJ] Go, go, go, go! -[Pope] Go into the marsh.
translation.zh: -走！ -进入沼泽

translation.en: -[Kie] Let's go! -[John B] I'm going. Act natural.
translation.zh: -我们走！ -我在开 表现自然点

translation.en: [Kie] Hey, guys, they're following us.
translation.zh: 嘿 大家 他们在跟着我们！

translation.en: -[Pope] This can't be good. -Shit.
translation.zh: -噢 这可不妙！ -该死

translation.en: [JJ] Dude, you gotta go faster!
translation.zh: 哥们 你得开快点！

translation.en: -I'm going! -Gun it!
translation.zh: -我在开了 -加速前进

translation.en: -[Pope] What the... -[Kie] Holy shit!
translation.zh: -这究竟… -该死 各位！

translation.en: [JJ] John B, get down!
translation.zh: 小约翰 趴下！

translation.en: [Pope] We're gonna die!
translation.zh: 哦 我的天 我们要死了！

translation.en: Shit! Pope, move.
translation.zh: 该死！教皇 让开！

translation.en: -[Kie yells] -Get down, Kie!
translation.zh: 趴下 小琪！

translation.en: -Oh, my God! Whoo! -[Kie] Whew!
translation.zh: 哦 我的天！

translation.en: [JJ] Booyeah! Pogue god, man!
translation.zh: 小鱼儿神了 天！

translation.en: -See you, guys! -[Kie] That was insane!
translation.zh: -再见了 两位！ -真疯狂！

translation.en: [Kie] Oh, God.
translation.zh: 哦 天

translation.en: -What do you think it is? -[John B] Gotta be money, right?
translation.zh: -你觉得这是什么？ -肯定是钱什么的 对吧？

translation.en: That or a couple of keys with street value to the low- to mid-mils!
translation.zh: 要么是钱 要么几把价值成百上千万的钥匙

translation.en: -[Pope] Can we please just open the bag? -[John B] Wow, Pope.
translation.zh: 我们能打开包了吗？ 哇 教皇

translation.en: That's a rare outburst of emotion.
translation.zh: 你这反应可少见啊

translation.en: Okay. You guys are literally killing me with anticipation.
translation.zh: 好吧 你们真的让我迫不及待了

translation.en: -Open the bag. -[JJ] Jeez.
translation.zh: -打开包 -好的

translation.en: [Pope] We almost died over this.
translation.zh: 我们几乎为此丧命

translation.en: [Pope] Oh, wow. Yup. That's about right.
translation.zh: 噢 哇 对 这就对了

translation.en: Good job, everybody. We found a compass.
translation.zh: 干得漂亮 大家伙 我们找到了一个罗盘

translation.en: Dude, what? It's not worth anything.
translation.zh: 哥们 怎么？这根本不值钱

translation.en: This was my father's.
translation.zh: 这是我爸的
